oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Charles D. Fletcher: Muslim-Christian Engagement in the Twentieth Century. The Principles of Interfaith Dialogue and the Work of Isma‘il al-Faruqi
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Howard, Damian
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This contribution offers a review of Charles D. Fletcher's bookMuslim-Christian Engagement in the Twentieth Century. The Principles of Interfaith Dialogue and the Work of Isma‘il al-Faruqi.London & New York: I.B. Tauris, 2015.336 pages, £68.00, ISBN: 978-1848855090.
